summary: An email from an FBI analyst or prosecutor in the Southern District of New York reviewing hotline callers from the FBI file on the Epstein case. The email highlights a specific caller's recollection of a comment made by Ghislaine Maxwell and notes its similarity to another witness's account, suggesting a potential lead for follow-up.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a recalled comment by a hotline caller, specifically a statement about 'one less blow job for me'.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A hotline caller reported a specific comment recalled from Ghislaine Maxwell: 'one less blow job for me'.
The comment was noted as strikingly similar to something another witness (name redacted) recalls Maxwell saying.
The email asks if there has been follow-up with this particular hotline caller.
The correspondence is from the Southern District of New York, indicating ongoing investigative work in October 2020.
